Title: Someone's Diary #2
Text: Haha, I bet no one would have known that I keep the combination here. Now the first two digits derive from my birthday: 2 and 4. The third digit is the number of light strips, and the fourth is the number of steps before the Gate! Haha, from now on it takes only one glance if I forget the combination. I will never “forget” anymore. And no dirty looks from the Security Administrator anymore!
